title: Studio in great Midtown Location-68 -14 W. Ferry Studio
posting_body: ['Spacious Garden level studio.', 'These charming apartments have hardwood floors, large closets and plenty of light.', 'What really sets these apartments apart is the extra bonus room in the front.', 'These apartments rarely come available, so grab one if you can.', ' Attentive management.', 'Great value for the best location in Midtown.', 'DIA, Wayne State, CCS, HopCat, countless restaurants and shops all steps from your front door.', "The ideal place to enjoy Detroit's Best Neighborhood.", '\u200b', 'Includes water + heat.', 'Available for move in July.', 'Taking Reservations now!', 'CALL TODAY TO SET UP SHOWING', 'show contact info', 'Security Deposit Equal to rental rate ($650)', '$35 application fee per tenant', '$25 per month pet fee (cats only)', 'FEATURES', 'Conveniently located in the heart of Midtown', 'Gas Stove', 'Refrigerator', 'New Coin Operated Laundry', 'Heat/Water/Sewer/Trash Removal included', 'Onsite Management and Maintenance', 'Access to Wayne State Parking Structure 1', 'Walking distance to shopping, entertainment, restaurants, museums and hospitals', 'For more information visit <URL> and look under Studio in building 68 W. Ferry the Fee Apartments.', 'Visit us at our office at 100 W. Ferry Street', 'Monday: 9:30am-3:00pm', 'Tuesday: 9:30am-3:00pm', 'Wednesday:', '5:00pm-8:00pm', 'Thursday: 9:30am-3:00pm', 'Friday: 9:30am-3:00pm', 'Great neighbors!', 'We require Proof of income, employment, background and credit check from all our tenants.', 'Cass and Ferry Apartments', '100 West Ferry Ste 1', 'Detroit MI 48202', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'Keywords: Midtown, Apartments, LIVE MIDTOWN PROGRAM eligible, Wayne State Housing, WSU, CCS, Center for Creative Studies, DMC, Detroit Medical Center']
